instance_id.description: ID of the Zendesk instance associated with the ticket

status.description: The current status of the ticket (open, pending, solved, etc.).

calendar.description: The status of the ticket in calendar hours

business.description: The status of the ticket in business hours

agent_wait_time_in_minutes.description: The total time an agent spent waiting before responding to the ticket.

calendar.description: Time spent waiting for an agent to respond in calendar hours

business.description: Time spent waiting for an agent to respond in business hours

assignee_stations.description: Number of stations assigned to the ticket's assignee

created_at.description: Timestamp when the ticket was created

first_resolution_time_in_minutes.description: The time taken to provide the initial resolution to the ticket.

calendar.description: Time taken to provide the first resolution in calendar hours

business.description: Time taken to provide the first resolution in business hours

full_resolution_time_in_minutes.description: The total time taken to completely resolve the ticket.

calendar.description: Total time taken to fully resolve the ticket in calendar hours

business.description: Total time taken to fully resolve the ticket in business hours

group_stations.description: Number of stations assigned to the ticket's group

latest_comment_added_at.description: Timestamp when the latest comment was added

on_hold_time_in_minutes.description: The cumulative time the ticket spent on hold during its lifecycle.

calendar.description: Total time the ticket was on hold in calendar hours

business.description: Total time the ticket was on hold in business hours

reopens.description: Number of times the ticket has been reopened

replies.description: Number of replies made on the ticket

reply_time_in_minutes.description: The time taken to reply to the ticket after initial submission.

calendar.description: Average time taken to reply to the ticket in calendar hours

business.description: Average time taken to reply to the ticket in business hours

requester_updated_at.description: Timestamp when the requester information was last updated

requester_wait_time_in_minutes.description: The time a requester had to wait before the ticket was assigned to an agent.

calendar.description: Time spent waiting for a requester response in calendar hours

business.description: Time spent waiting for a requester response in business hours

status_updated_at.description: Timestamp when the status of the ticket was last updated

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the ticket was last updated

url.description: URL link to the ticket details

initially_assigned_at.description: Timestamp when the ticket was initially assigned

assigned_at.description: Timestamp when the ticket was assigned to an agent

solved_at.description: Timestamp when the ticket was solved

assignee_updated_at.description: Timestamp when the assignee was last updated

custom_status_updated_at.description: Timestamp when the custom status was last updated

reply_time_in_seconds.description: The time taken to reply to the ticket after initial submission in seconds.

calendar.description: Average time taken to reply to the ticket in seconds (calendar hours)

business.description: Average time taken to reply to the ticket in seconds (business hours)
